body:
Just a Simple Suggestion.
Avicus should make Publicity On Pages or things like that for Growing the community.
For that It should be a new Rank for people "Job" On Avicus would be making Publicity On servers, pages, etc.
Other thing it could do Avicus for growing the + periodic on, "Contract" "famous" YTers for recording on Avicus & invite their subs, Like cube or Olimpocft.
Thanks x Attention ! ^-*

title: [Suggestion] Avicus Publicity

replies.body: Advertisement is what we need on different websites. It all costs money though.
